briefdescription.para: Set number of input nodes to int i.

parameterdescription.para: i] Number of nodes on the input layer.

briefdescription.para: Set number of output to int i.

parameterdescription.para: i] Number of nodes on the output layer.

briefdescription.para: Set hidden nodes to int i.

parameterdescription.para: i] Number of nodes on the hidden layer.

briefdescription.para: Set Activation function to be used to int i.

parameterdescription.para: i] Activation function to be used.

briefdescription.para: Set minimum error to double d.
Set learning rate to double d.

parameterdescription.para: d] Learning rate of the neural network.

briefdescription.para: Get int number of input nodes.
Get int number of output nodes.
Get int number of hidden nodes.

parameterdescription.para: Determines weather to train or to test.

briefdescription.para: Initialize weights and biases with values between -0.5 and 0.5.

detaileddescription.para:
Until error is under threshold or maximum number of iterations is reached.
Input Dataset is filled.
Expected Output Dataset is filled.
Weights are optimal.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the segmoidal/segmoidal inverse of a double [x].

parameterdescription.para: Determines weather to calculate segmoidal or inverse.

briefdescription.para: Propagate input starting from the input layer up to the output layer. Uses softmax activation function.

simplesect.para: Hidden and Output nodes are computed.

briefdescription.para: Calculate the error signal for each node. Uses corss entropy error function.

simplesect.para: Actual output is calculated using function [propagate].
Delta signal for all nodes is calculated.

briefdescription.para: Back propagate the error starting from the output layer down to the input layer.

simplesect.para: Delta signal for each node has been calculated.
Bias and Weights doesn't hold garpage.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the net for each node.

simplesect.para: Net is caculated for Output and Hidden nodes.
